content: Smarthistory offers more than one thousand videos and essays on art from around the world and across time. We are working with more than one hundred art historians and some of the world's most important museums to make the best art history resource anywhere. Use the "subject" pulldown menu (go to "Humanities") at the top of this window or click on the headings below to access our content:

*   First things first (you are here)     
*   The materials and techniques artists use
*   Art 1010
